name: Virus Hunter (8 Game Studio)
description:
This a newly develop video game during this pandemic :) I have been staying home with my newborn and learn how to make game as a non-coder.

This game is very easy and straight forward:

- Destroy as many of the "viruses" as you can to score. Each virus has difference score. 

- Do Not let the viruses approach the DNA bar, you will lose life. You only have three lives.

-  Try not to touch on the red "blood cells", they give you score when they reach DNA bar. However, you will lose some score if you touch them.

Enjoy this causal game during free time.

Play your best and challenge your relative, your partner, your friends. 

Stay fast. Stay best. Stay safe.

Thank you
